text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the morning light
Shoes on got my smile bright
Step outside my worries gone
Dance around till the break of dawn

[Verse 2]
Puddles splash beneath my feet
Heartbeat syncs to the rhythm beat
Clouds above but I feel no fear
Dancing through the atmosphere

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh oh oh
Feel the joy don't let it go
Spinning round let the world see
This is where I'm meant to be

[Verse 3]
Raindrops like a sweet embrace
Every step a happy pace
Laughing loud like it's a game
Life’s a joy we can’t contain

[Bridge]
Don’t need sunshine to feel alive
Moments like this make us thrive
Jump and twirl with all our might
In the rain we take flight

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh oh oh
Feel the joy don't let it go
Spinning round let the world see
This is where I'm meant to be
title: Dancing in the Rain
